languages.text: "Да хоть Главный кормчий. На Лорд-капитана совершено покушение, от дознания не освобожден никто. А у блюстителей — особые полномочия".

"I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. The enforcers have been given special powers to deal with the situation."
languages.original_text: "Да хоть Главный кормчий. На Лорд-капитана совершено покушение, от дознания не освобожден никто. А у блюстителей — особые полномочия".

traits.locale_text: "I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. And the enforcers have special powers."
"I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. And the enforcers have special powers."
"I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. Besides, the enforcers have special powers."
"I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. Besides, the enforcers have special powers."

"I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. The enforcers have been given special powers to deal with the situation."

"I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. The enforcers have been given special powers to deal with the situation."

"I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. The enforcers have been given special powers to deal with the situation."

languages.text: "Mir ist egal, ob Ihr der Hauptsteuermann seid. Es gab ein Attentat auf den Lord Captain, also wird ausnahmslos jeder befragt. Die Enforcer haben besondere Befugnisse erhalten, um der Situation zu begegnen."
languages.original_text: "I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. The enforcers have been given special powers to deal with the situation."

traits.locale_text: "Mir ist egal, ob Ihr der Hauptsteuermann seid. Es gab ein Attentat auf den Lord Captain, also wird ausnahmslos jeder befragt. Die Enforcer haben besondere Befugnisse erhalten, um der Situation zu begegnen.

languages.text: « Vous pourriez être le maître timonier que ça ne changerait rien. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a été victime d'une tentative d'assassinat, et personne n'échappera à l'enquête. Les prévôts ont reçu tous les pouvoirs pour gérer cette situation. »
languages.original_text: "I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. The enforcers have been given special powers to deal with the situation."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pourriez être le maître timonier que ça ne changerait rien. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a été victime d'une tentative d'assassinat, et personne n'échappera à l'enquête. Les prévôts ont reçu tous les pouvoirs pour gérer cette situation. »

languages.text: «Me da igual si es el mismísimo maestro timonel. Se ha producido un atentado contra {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y nadie está exento de sospecha. El personal de seguridad ha sido dotado de poderes especiales para resolver la situación».
languages.original_text: "I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. The enforcers have been given special powers to deal with the situation."

traits.locale_text: «Me da igual si es el mismísimo maestro timonel. Se ha producido un atentado contra {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y nadie está exento de sospecha. El personal de seguridad ha sido dotado de poderes especiales para resolver la situación».

languages.text: 「あなたがマスター・ヘルムスマンだろうと関係ない。ロード・キャプテンの暗殺未遂があったんだ。誰一人として取り調べを逃れることはできない。エンフォーサーにはこの事態に対処するための特別な権限が与えられているのだ」
languages.original_text: "I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. The enforcers have been given special powers to deal with the situation."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたがマスター・ヘルムスマンだろうと関係ない。ロード・キャプテンの暗殺未遂があったんだ。誰一人として取り調べを逃れることはできない。エンフォーサーにはこの事態に対処するための特別な権限が与えられているのだ」

languages.text: “我才不管你是不是舵手长。有人打算刺杀舰长大人，所以每个人都要接受调查。处理这种情况的时候，执法者是拥有特许权力的。”
languages.original_text: "I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. The enforcers have been given special powers to deal with the situation."

traits.locale_text: “我才不管你是不是舵手长。有人打算刺杀舰长大人，所以每个人都要接受调查。处理这种情况的时候，执法者是拥有特许权力的。”

languages.text: "İstersen Başserdümen ol, umurumda değil. Lord Kaptan'a suikast girişiminde bulunuldu. Yani artık kimse sorgudan muaf tutulamaz. İnfazcılara hususla ilgilenmeleri için özel yetkiler verildi."
languages.original_text: "I do not care if you are the Master Helmsman. There has been an assassination attempt on the Lord Captain, so no one is exempt from inquiry. The enforcers have been given special powers to deal with the situation."
